means: 迅速消失遗忘的，短暂的

word_mean: 易消灭的，渐消失的，挥发性的

sentence.Network_en: The evanescent post - war economic boom was quickly followed by a deep recession.
sentence.Network_cn: 大萧条紧随短暂的战后经济繁荣而来.

sentence.Network_en: All was unstable; quivering as leaves, evanescent as lightning.
sentence.Network_cn: 一切都是不稳定的, 都象树叶似地颤动翻转,象闪电似地倏忽明灭.

sentence.Network_en: By epiphany he means'the most delicate and evanescent of such memorable focusing moments.'
sentence.Network_cn: 他的“显现”指的是 “ 那种难于忘怀的了,令人聚精会神的最微妙最短暂的时刻. ”

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (in the sense 'almost imperceptible'): from Latin evanescent- 'disappearing', from the verb evanescere (see evanesce)

entry.tran: 逐渐消失的；逐渐忘却的
entry.def: Something that is evanescent gradually disappears from sight or memory.

example.tran: 夏季香草逐渐消散的香味

auth_sentence.content: Seeking to find words that would convey elusive and evanescent thought.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seeking to find words that would convey elusive and evanescent thought.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seeking to find words that would convey elusive and evanescent thought.

auth_sentence.content: One by one the tracks glide by, mostly pleasant, often evanescent.
auth_sentence.res_content: One by one the tracks glide by, mostly pleasant, often evanescent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One by one the tracks glide by, mostly pleasant, often evanescent.

auth_sentence.content: Life is precious not because it is eternal but because it is transitory and evanescent!
auth_sentence.res_content: Life is precious not because it is eternal but because it is transitory and evanescent!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Life is precious not because it is eternal but because it is transitory and evanescent!

stems_affixes.value_cn: 高级的, 年老的, 先进的
stems_affixes.word_buile: advance[n.&v.前进, 提升]+ed表形容词→adj.高级的, 年老的, 先进的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 渐消失的, 易消散的, 会凋零的
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+van空+escent开始……的→开始空出去的→渐消失的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 徒然的, 无益的, 虚荣的, 空虚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vain=van空→adj.徒然的, 无益的, 虚荣的, 空虚的
van空+ity表名词→心里空空→虚荣心

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逐渐消失, 容易消失, 幻灭, 瞬息
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+van空+escency开始→开始空出去→渐消失
ad向+van前卫,先锋+ce→n.&v.前进, 提升
